# Tidy Tuesday week 43

## Get data

```{r}
library(tidytuesdayR)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2020, week = 43)
```

## Explore

```{r}
library(dplyr)
tuesdata$beer_awards %>% glimpse()
beer = tuesdata$beer_awards

library(tigris)
states = states()
states

beer_states = states %>% right_join(beer, by = c('STUSPS'='state'))

beer_states %>% group_by(NAME, medal, year) %>% 
  summarise(n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(`n()`))
```
